phrases: You can hear me, cannot you?!
I swear I will get you outta here!
Another one of the engraved seals has been removed.
If the remaining three disappear, the owners will lose the right of possession.
Struggle how you might, it is pointless.
In mere moments, Lucy Heartfilia will merge with the Infinity Clock.
And when that happens, it will become possible for us to take control of Real Nightmare.
I will not let anyone lay a hand on Nee-san.
She is going to stay with me forever.
While we were fighting with Legion over the memento from Lucy's dad,
the new Oracion Seis appeared before us.
They stole the Infinity Clock and abducted Lucy.
We handpicked members headed for Infinity Castle to try to stop Real Nightmare.
If we can defeat all Six Generals barring our way, we will be able to stop Real Nightmare.
Right now, there are three left!
She said that was all a lie...
What is going on over there?!
Lucy's going to be swallowed up by the Infinity Clock!
I Can Hear the Voices of My Friends!
Lucy is merging with the Infinity Clock?!
That must be why we cannot reach her by telepathy!
Is there anything we can do?
You need to rest a little!
Hurry up and beat Oracion Seis!
If Lucy becomes one with the Infinity Clock, it will be too late!
You need to take me down without a moment to spare,
so my engraved seal on the Infinity Clock will be erased...
I do not know what those words mean!
Even if you are defeated, you still have friends, eh?
You can rely on them, but you will not beat me!
In order to receive our new powers, we each lost something irreplaceable!
For Erigor, it was his memories.
For Racer, it was his heart!
What you scum lack is the resolve to lose something important!
No one can surpass the weight upon our hearts!
What are you doing over there?!
At a time like this, there was no way I was going to stay home!
I know how you feel, but this time...
Either way, there is no time!
They have to beat the remaining Oracion Seis members and save Lucy!
I will tell you the route Natsu and the others took, so head that way!
We are headin' that way, too!
He descended into the depths with his comrades.
More importantly, do you know what happened to Samuel and the others?
You have no more reason to go after Lucy!
If we defeat all Six Generals, their seals will disappear.
But you are too late to stop Lucy Heartfilia from merging with the Infinity Clock.
I had a... trying nightmare for the longest time...
It had nothing to do with my own will.
I was controlled like a puppet,
However, taking no heed of the danger, these people rescued me.
But even though I was manipulated, I saw from the enemy's viewpoint,
There is something we would like you to tell us!
Archbishop, you know a lot about the Infinity Clock, right?
You want to know about the captured Celestial Spirit Wizard, do not you?
You say you want to be with Lucy forever?
She trusted you, and even after she realized you betrayed her,
she wants to believe in you again.
There is nothing to hesitate over.
You are just trying to take back what you lost...
I am sure Nee-san will be happier this way!
After all, we were always together!
You are not the real Michelle!
Even if you were always together, it was a big lie!
After Lucy-nee lost her family, imagine how happy she was when she met you!
Why did you tell such an awful lie?!
She believed that you were her friend...
You cannot let them shake you, Imitatia-sama.
Anyone who stands in your way is an enemy.
Figuring out who the hell you are can wait'til later.
Right now, I am going to kick your ass an' save Lucy.
This should be an amusing spectacle!
You are the new Oracion Seis's number two.
I will make your prayers come true.
But first, show me your allegiance.
I knew you could do it.
All you need think about is your most fervent wish, living together with Lucy Heartfilia for eternity...
I will do whatever is needed to make your prayer come true.
Murderous intent detected nearby, approaching rapidly...
I will stop the Infinity Clock by spilling your blood!
I do not have time to argue with you!
Then tear through me with those claws first!
I am not doing this for the sake of church doctrine!
I am following my own heart...
Even though you know it is wrong?!
But to put an end to this chaos, I have no other choice!
Is that the answer you arrived at?
I am going to wipe that decision to take a life right out of your head!
Everyone is lying on the ground in front of me...
This showdown are not over yet!
This is why I said he should be taken out for good!
Whatever he tries to do, it is too late.
Why do you want power that badly?
Is spreading chaos and destruction and getting revenge that important to you?!
If I do not accomplish this, I will not be able to look Cubelious in the face!
I have nothing else left to lose.
I threw away everything, so I am afraid of nothing.
There is nothing you can do, Titania!
There is a way to slow down the merging of Lucy and the Infinity Clock!
The archbishop will explain, so listen carefully!
To merge with a sacrificial Celestial Spirit Wizard,
it takes a telepathic bond to be formed with the person and her sense of time.
In other words, it must integrate with her memories.
For that, the chains descending from the Infinity Castle to the ground spread Real Nightmare,
while at the same time taking in the land's magic power and all memories.
Put another way, you can buy some time by cutting the chains!
Byro and Zentopia's monk soldiers already left!
They look like they will be filling!
Let us snap those chains, Sammy!
Let us have a contest to see who can chop through the most, Nii-san!
This is the power of your feelings?!
Looks like I still had a chance, huh?!
I am going to dispose of you in one stroke.
Cubelious... I am going to use...
This ancient weapon is said to keep evil at bay!
I can use it like this, too...
I guess you cannot ask about what you do not know, huh?
I did not expect you would pull that out at the eleventh hour!
You intend to bring us both down?!
She is in high spirits, too!
I cannot let her outdo me!
We are heading to the next chain!
This does not have to do anything with a guild or Legion!
I am just doing this to correct my mistake!
I am getting closer and closer!
You said you are strong because you lost everything, yes?
But that is not true strength!
People get stronger when they have got something to protect!
If you have got a real friend, they support you!
But you only think about yourself!
Could you really hear the voice of your friend?!
You do not feel shame now when you think of your friend or whatever?!
It seems you went too far!
But it is as far as you get.
I am going to crush your head!
Her form has changed... but I can hear her thoughts!
This cannot have been a mistake!
I did not expect you to lose your composure in the heat of battle...
Feelings for friends do not drag you down.
You actually realize it, too, do not you...
You can hear the voice of your friend.
Could you throw everything away that easily?
He is come to get me!
Another engraved seal has been erased.
Now I just got to mop the floor with you guys!
You really are a tenacious man.
But you are only buying time.
You are not having any effect on the big picture.
The destruction of everything that has form...
And bringing about nothingness and chaos...
It did not work seven years ago.
But this time, I will not let you interfere, Natsu Dragneel.
I will tell you one thing.
The Infinity Clock girl that you are trying to save...
It is already too late to save her.
100 years of sleep is as simple as falling off a log.
Lucy Heartfilia is becoming part of the Infinity Clock,
and when it is done, she will lose her body and mind, too.
And once she is become a piece of the clock, she will be erased from everyone is memories as well.
Her very existence will be wiped off the face of Earthland.
I mean, Nee-san is going to be together with me...
She is just going to become a tool.
You can be with her as much as you like.
For someone like you, she will be the perfect partner.
What do you think you are going to do?!
I do not have any dreams.
If it does not prick your conscience, anyone could easily make those choices, right?
Back to... the way it was?
Somewhere along the line, I realized...
This girl was my precious little sister...
You will get your shoe dirty!
Is it that funny to you when someone is sad?
In that case, I will beat you'til you will not even be able to crack a smile!
At this rate, Lucy's going to...
But it feels like his hatred is stronger than anyone else's in Oracion Seis.
Even so, we are not going to lose!
We are carrying the combined will of everyone in Fairy Tail on our shoulders as we fight him!
Although I am the one that is fightin'!
You have to bring that up now?!
I am not going to let you get away with just soundin' cool!
